name: Primary care & Support Services for Children & Adults
description: They provide a wide range of care through scheduled or same-day appointments. They offer primary medical care and dental care for children and adults, a variety of specialty services and other services by referral. They have laboratory and Pharmacy services on site at several of their clinics. Financial counselors are available by appointment to help you with your insurance questions. They accept Covered California insurance plans (Anthem Blue Cross, Blue Shield, HealthNet), Medicare, Medi-Cal,
